string.text:
A compact, integrally suppressed assault rifle designed for stealth operations and close-quarters combat. Its advanced suppressed system minimizes both noise and muzzle flash, making it highly effective for special forces and covert missions. Featuring a lightweight polymer frame and a modular rail system, it allows for easy customization with optics and tactical accessories while maintaining excellent maneuverability.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Kalashnikov Concern
